info.title: Scalar Bakery
info.description:
The Scalar Bakery is an example OpenAPI document to test OpenAPI tools and libraries. It's a fictional bakery platform with guilds, members, roles, and a lot of test data. Browse all [guilds](#tag/guilds/get/guilds) or invite a new baker with [invite links](#tag/invites/post/guilds/{guildId}/invites). ## Resources * https://github.com/scalar/scalar * https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification * https://scalar.com ## Markdown Support All descriptions *can* contain **Markdown**. You can even create [internal links to reference endpoints](#tag/authentication/post/auth/signup).
Examples **Blockquotes** > I love OpenAPI. <3 **Tables** | Feature | Availability | | ---------------- | ------------ | | Markdown Support | ✓ | **Accordion** ```html
